mapper.select: select m.id, m.member_email, m.member_password, m.member_name, m.member_status, m.created_datetime, m.updated_datetime, o.provider from tbl_member m join tbl_oauth o on m.id = o.id where m.id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member_career(affiliation_title, member_employment_type, member_role, member_skill, intro_detailed, start_date, end_date, member_id) VALUES (#{affiliationTitle}, #{memberEmploymentType},#{memberRole}, #{memberSkill}, #{introDetailed}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{memberId})
